attributes.action: Add a tick box on all future election forms for "None of the Above" and the results of such choice be counted and displayed in the election results
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If you cannnot vote for anyone in any election due to you not wanting any of the choices offered, you can either not vote (what a waste) or you could use the new None of the Above to register your disatisfaction in the options available. At least your choice will be counted as a vote.
